reviews.review: El 2 es mejor pero este me hace muchos recuerdos es muy bueno este juego lo recomiendo
The community is still alive after all these years.  It's easy to join a game or start a game and have it fill quickly with players.  Seems to be a community full of good comradery.

The game consists of a series of loosely related missions that are linear. The fun is popping off zombies. They get this part right. The team consists of 4 people with you as one of them. They have distinct personalities. They add to the game. I doubt I would play it again, but I enjoyed it for what it is. 7/10

man this was a short experience, this is a solo single-player campaign review  :

same game play, same enemies, same weapons, the only thing changing is the scene and setting, no story is there for the most casual player, I imagine it was a great replacement for cs source zombie mods but as today the fun didn't age well as no more players are on the servers anymore; for 2008 this was a great game but in 2021 the fun doesn't hold up anymore.

Left 4 Dead is a masterpiece of a game, and probably one of the best if not the best Zombie games of the pre-2010s. Mostly enjoyable with friends with his various game modes including: Versus where a team of 4v4 fights each others either as survivors or special infected and Survival to see how long you can survive from endless hordes. The game doesn't require a powerful PC and pretty much launch on any PCs (With the base requirements). A lot of people prefer Left 4 Dead 2, but if you want the original experience I recommend the first game.
